block.p: Irene Khaitman, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Moisey Khaitman of Rockaway, N.J., is to be married today to Joel Fisher, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Harold Fisher of Flushing, Queens. Rabbi Michael Strasberg is to officiate at the Shelter Rock Jewish Center in Roslyn, L.I.

The bride, 28, is an assistant general counsel at the Triarc Companies, a conglomerate in New York. She graduated summa cum laude from Yale University, from which she also received master's degrees in political science and philosophy. She received her law degree from Harvard University.

Irene Khaitman, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Moisey Khaitman of Rockaway, N.J., is to be married today to Joel Fisher, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Harold Fisher of Flushing, Queens. Rabbi Michael Strasberg is to officiate at the Shelter Rock Jewish Center in Roslyn, L.I.

The bride, 28, is an assistant general counsel at the Triarc Companies, a conglomerate in New York. She graduated summa cum laude from Yale University, from which she also received master's degrees in political science and philosophy. She received her law degree from Harvard University.
The bridegroom, 33, is the owner of two auto repair centers, International Auto Service and Best Auto Repair, both in Flushing. He graduated from Queens College. WEDDINGS
